text: Spirit is the debut studio album by English singer Leona Lewis. It was released by Syco in November 2007 in the United Kingdom and Ireland. It was released everywhere else in early 2008. ==Reviews== Spirit received generally positive to mixed reviews. ==Track listing== ===Deluxe edition=== ==References== ==References== Category:2007 albums Category:2008 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Leona Lewis albums Category:Pop albums Category:R&B; albums Category:Soul albums
title: Spirit (Leona Lewis album)
